org.cpsolver.studentsct.model

Class RequestGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.assignment.context.AbstractClassWithContext<Request,Enrollment,RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext>
      • org.cpsolver.studentsct.model.RequestGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, CanInheritContext<Request,Enrollment,RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext>, HasAssignmentContext<Request,Enrollment,RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext>

    public class RequestGroup
extends AbstractClassWithContext<Request,Enrollment,RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext>
implements CanInheritContext<Request,Enrollment,RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext>
    Representation of a group of students requesting the same course that should be scheduled in the same set of sections.

    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
    Copyright (C) 2015 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org
    http://muller.unitime.org

    This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

    You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this library; if not see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
    Author:
    Tomáš Müller

    • Constructor Detail

      • RequestGroup

        public RequestGroup(long id,
                    String name,
                    Course course)
        Creates request group. Pair (id, course) must be unique.
        Parameters:
        id - identification of the group
        name - group name
        course - course for which the group is created (only course requests for this course can be of this group)

    • Method Detail

      • addRequest

        public void addRequest(CourseRequest request)
        Add course request to the group. It has to contain the course of this group getCourse(). This is done automatically by CourseRequest.addRequestGroup(RequestGroup).
        Parameters:
        request - course request to be added to this group

      • removeRequest

        public void removeRequest(CourseRequest request)
        Remove course request from the group. This is done automatically by CourseRequest.removeRequestGroup(RequestGroup).
        Parameters:
        request - course request to be removed from this group

      • getRequests

        public Set<CourseRequest> getRequests()
        Return the set of course requests that are associated with this group.
        Returns:
        course requests of this group

        public double getTotalWeight()
        Total weight (using Request.getWeight()) of the course requests of this group
        Returns:
        total weight of course requests in this group

        request group name

      • getCourse

        public Course getCourse()
        Course associated with this group. Only course requests for this course can be of this group.
        Returns:
        course of this request group

      • getEnrollmentWeight

        public double getEnrollmentWeight(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                                  Request excludeRequest)
        Enrollment weight -- weight of all requests which have an enrollment that is of this request group, excluding the given one. See Request.getWeight().
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        excludeRequest - course request to ignore, if any
        Returns:
        enrollment weight

      • getSectionWeight

        public double getSectionWeight(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                               Section section,
                               Request excludeRequest)
        Section weight -- weight of all requests which have an enrollment that is of this request group and that includes the given section, excluding the given one. See Request.getWeight().
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        section - section in question
        excludeRequest - course request to ignore, if any
        Returns:
        enrollment weight

      • getEnrollmentSpread

        public double getEnrollmentSpread(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                                  Enrollment enrollment,
                                  double bestRatio,
                                  double fillRatio)
        Return how much is the given enrollment similar to other enrollments of this group.
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        enrollment - enrollment in question
        bestRatio - how much of the weight should be used on estimation of the enrollment potential (considering that students of this group that are not yet enrolled can take the same enrollment)
        fillRatio - how much of the weight should be used in estimation how well are the sections of this enrollments going to be filled (bestRatio + fillRatio <= 1.0)
        Returns:
        1.0 if all enrollments have the same sections as the given one, 0.0 if there is no match at all

      • getAverageSpread

        public double getAverageSpread(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment)
        Return average section spread of this group. It reflects the probability of two students of this group being enrolled in the same section.
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        Returns:
        1.0 if all enrollments have the same sections as the given one, 0.0 if there is no match at all

      • getSectionSpread

        public double getSectionSpread(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                               Section section)
        Return section spread of this group. It reflects the probability of two students of this group being enrolled in this section.
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        section - given section
        Returns:
        1.0 if all enrollments have the same sections as the given one, 0.0 if there is no match at all

      • createAssignmentContext

        public RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext createAssignmentContext(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment)
        Description copied from interface: HasAssignmentContext
        Create a new assignment context for the given assignment. If there are already some variables assigned in the value, the method should make sure that the context is appropriately initialized.
        Specified by:
        createAssignmentContext in interface HasAssignmentContext<Request,Enrollment,RequestGroup.RequestGroupContext>
        Parameters:
        assignment - an assignment for which there needs to be an assignment context
        Returns:
        a new instance of the assignment context, filled according to the given assignment
